author: Haytech
post_text: September 11, 2014 at 1:06 PM#1Hi,how can I generate a random number in a personal Variable.I want to call my colorcuestacks randomly so i need a new random number between 0 and 12 each time i use my goto macro.Cheers

posts.author: Haytech
posts.post_text: September 11, 2014 at 1:06 PM#1Hi,how can I generate a random number in a personal Variable.I want to call my colorcuestacks randomly so i need a new random number between 0 and 12 each time i use my goto macro.Cheers

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: September 11, 2014 at 2:34 PM#2you could create a 12 cue sequence each with the CMDSetUserVar $random=1;SetUserVar $random=2;etcSet the sequence to Chasemode, Direction random, and run the sequence to get the random number..

posts.author: Haytech
posts.post_text: September 11, 2014 at 7:30 PM#3Thank You Glad!It. Works like a Charm

title: Generate a random two digit number
